properties.name: surface_name
properties.description: The name of the surface - atom types (and orientation)

properties.name: atoms
properties.description: List of atom type(s) (chemical symbol) and number of this type excluding the surface atoms

properties.name: atom_species
properties.description: Chemical formula excluding surface atoms in alphabetical order with H and C placed first

properties.name: state
properties.description: Refers to the state of the molecule system - surface, gasphase, adsorbed state, transition state

properties.name: site_name
properties.description: The adsorption or transition site(s) of the atom(s) or molecule(s) for the adsorbed or transition state

properties.name: total_energy
properties.description: The total energy of the system from the DFT calculation

properties.name: frequencies
properties.description: List of the frequencies calculated for the system

properties.name: cell
properties.description: 3x3 array with the lattice parameters of the system corresponding to the x, y and z directions

properties.name: info
properties.description: Optional - any relevant info can be added here
